bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Attribute Controller crashes when the visibility level is changed.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Attribute Controller crashes when the visibility level is changed. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch Harvester GUI. Load a GenTL Producer. Open Attribute Controller window. Change the visibility level. You'll see Harvester GUI is crashed.
Expected behavior Harvester GUI must not crash if the visibility level is changed.
